recipesJson.name: Article Recipe: Bacco Graham
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
MUST READ ARTICLE BEFORE MIXING
This is a tobacco graham cracker recipe 
Made for article "Mixing For Closed System Vapor Devices"
-> https://diyordievaping.com/2017/10/17/mixing-for-closed-system-devices/

reviews.text: The actual tobacco note in this is very soft, which I expect from Wayne's tobacco mixes.  More of an RY4 with a little edge, and a nice addition from the graham.
